title: [信息]globaltablist —— 最好用的蹦极服全球列表,必备 [全版本]
author: fire__rain
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:40 编辑 
hello,我是lampmc,这回带来的高质量插件是globaltablist全球tab列表插件,一个bungee插件,希望大家喜欢

简单介绍:
这是一个蹦极插件,用于bungee服显示全部在线玩家,功能上与bungeetablistplus类似
都是用于修改/显示bungee服全部玩家的,但这个插件却拥有更多很好的特性
比如说bungeetablistplus默认会占满整个屏幕的tab,如图
即使玩家不满,也会占用全部tab,就算只有一个玩家也是这样,而且没有玩家的地方也会显示ping值{:10_493:}

而这个插件就不一样了,默认是这样的


玩家数量少的时候显示以单排的形式显示,数量多了才会以多排的形式显示,十分高能啊
如图,你还可以自定义header/footer,这点与bungeetablistplus一样      




配置文件

#
#

# true: global tablist
# false: server unique tablist
useGlobalTablist: true

# whether ping is sent to clients
# setting this to false can help you reducing network traffic
updatePing: false

# Whether to sned header/footer to the clients or not
showHeaderFooter: true

# This text will be shown above the tablist on 1.8 clients
#  - {player} will be replaced with the name of the player
#  - {newline} will insert a linebreak
header: '&6Welcome &f{player}'

# This text will be shown below the tablist on 1.8 clients
#  - {player} will be replaced with the name of the player
#  - {newline} will insert a linebreak
#  - {server} server of the player
#  - {online} players online
#  - {max} max players
footer: '&4minecraft'

custom:
  lines:
# On 1.7 clients this replaces the missing header and footer.
# You can add some custom text slots at the top of the player list
#  - {player} will be replaced with the name of the player
#  - {server} server of the player
#  - {online} players online
#  - {max} max players
  top:
  - '&6Welcome'
  - '&6{player}'
  - '&6to our server'
  - ' '
  - ' '
  - ' 


  也是十分简单明了的,就不多讲了


源代码https://github.com/CodeCrafter47/GlobalTablist
